title: Format Factory 280
description:
Here are some key features of "FormatFactory":

Ã‚Â· All to MPG / AVI / 3GP / FLV / MP4.
Ã‚Â· All to MP3 / OGG / WMA / M4A / WAV.
Ã‚Â· All to JPG / BMP / PNG / TIF / ICO.

What's New in This Release: [ read full changelog ]

Ã‚Â· Video Files support multi-thread conversion
Ã‚Â· Picture Files support multi-thread conversion
Ã‚Â· Added output folder selection on accept file dialog.
Ã‚Â· Fixed aspect problem of "All to GIF"

Users are advised to pay attention while installing this ad-supported application:

Ã‚Â· Offers to install ASK toolbar and Quick Stores that the program does not require to fully function
Ã‚Â· Offers to change the homepage for web browsers installed in the system
Ã‚Â· Offers to change the default search engine for web browsers installed in the system
Ã‚Â· Displays ad banners or other types of advertising material during its runtime.
